content.question: Let <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the region in the first quadrant bounded by the graph of <math alttext="y equals, e to the negative x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></msup></mrow></math>, the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis, the <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis, and the line <math alttext="x equals b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow></math>. Region <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is the base of a solid whose cross sections perpendicular to the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis are squares. If the volume of the solid is <math alttext="four ninths" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>, what is the value of <math alttext="b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the natural log of, open parenthesis, 3 over the square root of 17, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>17</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the natural log of, open parenthesis, 3 over the square root of 7, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the natural log of, open parenthesis, 9 over 5, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="one half times, the natural log of 9" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one half times, the natural log of 9" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></math>

topic.text: 8.7: Volumes with Cross Sections - Squares and Rectangles

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
